pr_title: Add minor improvements to the CORS related APIs

timeline.message: Include permission for the CORS API in cors.yaml
Correct the license header in CORSService.java
Add missing CORS configuration parameters in the API

timeline.bodyText: Lines better be trimmed at 120 column for better readability
timeline.author: ruwanta

replies.bodyText: @ruwanta This is generated code by openapi-generator-maven-plugin. We usually don't manually format the generated code right?
